title: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed
description: When there is no data available for a series in a chart, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
EB: When there is no data available for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR:
1. Create a chart and set the data definition.
2. Select a column that has no data.
3. Verify that a friendly error message pops up reminding the user about the absence of data for the series.
